document_data.name: Harthos Zymorven
document_data.mainbody: '''Harthos Zymorven''' was the commander of [[Zymorven Hall]] in the [[Rauvin Vale]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Harthos was the lord of the [[Zymorven]] family of [[Silverymoon]]. His duty was to maintain the keep that watched over the [[Rauvin Road]], which was patrolled by the keep's soldiers.
document_data.Relationships:
Lord Zymorven had one son, [[Harthal Zymorven|Harthal]], with whom he was estranged.

He was friends with the innkeeper [[Urgala Meltimer]] of [[Triboar]].
document_data.Possessions: He wielded a ''[[giant slayer]] [[greatsword]]'' until it was stolen by his son.
